attributes.action: increase the price that electricity generators buy back domestically produced electricity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment, electricity generators buy back surplus domestically produced electricity at a price below which they sell it.  This does not encourage domestic electricity production.  In Germany, domestically produced elecricity is bought back from households at 6 times the rate it is sold to them at.  This encourages domestic electricity production.
